name: Sunrise
description: Licensed Sunrise electricians providing expert residential and commercial electrical services. From Sawgrass Mills commercial support to residential panel upgrades, Solomon Electric is your trusted local choice.

challenges.title: Major Commercial Power Support
challenges.description: Supporting one of the largest malls in the country requires electricians who understand high-capacity retail and commercial electrical needs and emergency response.

challenges.title: Aging Suburban Wiring
challenges.description: Homes built during Sunrise's original growth periods may have outdated panels or Federal Pacific breakers that need professional replacement for safety.

challenges.title: Severe Weather Readiness
challenges.description: Sunrise's central location makes it a target for summer storm surges. We prioritize whole-home surge protection to guard your property's sensitive electronics.

faqs.question: What electrical services do you offer in Sunrise?
faqs.answer: We provide comprehensive electrical services throughout Sunrise including panel upgrades (100A to 200A), emergency repairs, outlet and switch installation, lighting upgrades, ceiling fan installation, GFCI protection, EV charger installation, generator hookups, and 24/7 emergency service. Our licensed electricians serve all Sunrise neighborhoods.

faqs.question: Are your electricians licensed to work in Sunrise?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. All Solomon Electric technicians are Florida State Licensed (License #EC13012419) and fully insured. We pull all required Broward County permits for electrical work in Sunrise, ensuring your project passes inspection and meets current NEC code requirements.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Sunrise home needs a panel upgrade?
faqs.answer: Many Sunrise homes have outdated 100-amp panels that can't handle modern electrical demands. Signs you need an upgrade include: frequently tripping breakers, dimming lights when appliances run, planning to add an EV charger or pool, or if you have a Federal Pacific, Zinsco, or fuse box. We offer free panel inspections throughout Sunrise.

faqs.question: Do you offer 24/7 emergency electrical service in Sunrise?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide round-the-clock emergency electrical service to all Sunrise neighborhoods. If you're experiencing sparking outlets, burning smells, power outages, or any electrical emergency, call us immediately—we respond quickly to protect your property and family.

faqs.question: Do you offer emergency electrical repairs for Sunrise residents?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide 24/7 emergency electrical service to all Sunrise neighborhoods, including Welleby, Springtree, and the Sawgrass area.

faqs.question: Can you handle commercial electrical for Sunrise businesses?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We serve the extensive commercial districts surrounding Sawgrass Mills and major corporate hubs with tenant build-outs, maintenance, and emergency service.

seoContent.heading: Sunrise's Trusted Licensed Electricians
seoContent.body: Sunrise is a dynamic city that serves as a cornerstone of the Broward County community. From the family-friendly parks of Welleby to the world-class shopping at Sawgrass Mills, Sunrise requires a high standard of professional electrical care. Solomon Electric is proud to be a trusted provider for our Sunrise neighbors for over 15 years.

seoContent.heading: Understanding Sunrise's Electrical Needs
seoContent.body: Sunrise homes and businesses have unique electrical requirements that demand local expertise. Our electricians understand Broward County building codes, climate considerations, and the specific challenges of South Florida electrical systems. From aging infrastructure in established neighborhoods to modern smart home installations, we provide solutions tailored to Sunrise's needs.

seoContent.heading: Comprehensive Electrical Services for Your Sunrise Home
seoContent.body: Whether you're upgrading an older home's electrical system, installing modern energy-efficient lighting, adding an EV charger, or facing an urgent electrical issue, our licensed team delivers professional solutions throughout Sunrise. We provide transparent upfront pricing, respect your property, and stand behind our work with guarantees that have earned South Florida's trust for over 15 years.

seoContent.heading: Excellence in Electrical Care for Sunrise Families
seoContent.body: Whether you're upgrading the lighting in your Sunrise home, requiring an urgent panel replacement, or needing the peace of mind of a whole-home surge protector, our team is ready to help. We provide upfront pricing, clean workmanship, and a dedication to safety that Sunrise families can rely on.
